AzureBlade grinned evilly.

AzureBlade: No one else than your best. To prove my good faith, I 
will even give them some of the technology that I have...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras::
> 
> "At whom do you desire in your command???"hissed Hydras
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > AzureBlade: Then what we need is to make a diversion. Here is 
what 
> I 
> > propose.
> > 
> > He presses a button under his arm and projects a quickly devised 
> > holo representation of Unicron.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: I will need fliers, maybe three or four. We will 
> harass 
> > Unicron with High-Power weapons. This won't kill it, but it will 
> be 
> > enough so that we bear the big of his aggression, especially if 
he 
> > transforms. The Tripred Gun will also be able to do that.
> >

> > 
> > AzureBlade: Let me have my own command and I assure you that
